doc.previous: An important elaboration of the concept of a group occurs if G is endowed with additional structure notably of a topological space differentiable manifold or algebraic variety If the group operations m multiplication and i inversion
doc.after: are compatible with this structure i e are continuous smooth or regular in the sense of algebraic geometry maps then G becomes a topological group a Lie group or an algebraic group 2
